outputs.output_descr:
The vision behind the Justice and Security Programme and the hubs is to provide a decentralized and holistic approach to security and justice service delivery and a means by which national agencies can provide effective security in preparation for UNMIL's transition. It is envisaged that three core outputs will be delivered under the outcome on justice and security, including:
•Effective and improved  performance of the justice and security institutions in place through the provision of infrastructure, equipment and other logistical supports
•Capacity of National judicial and security institutions enhanced to address juvenile justice, SGBV and prosecution. 
•Improved access of community to Justice and security service providers in order to ensure responce to community security and justice priority needs

project_title: PBF Support to Liberia Peace Building Programme
